H0.text: Which artist's-works include Sunflowers and Pears and Street in Tahiti. Vincent van Gogh

H3.text: Which artist's-works include Sunflowers and Pears and Street in Tahiti. Gaugin

A4.text: Van Gogh painted several landscapes with flowers, including sunflowers.

A5.text: The sunflowers were painted to decorate the walls in anticipation of Gauguin's visit, and Van Gogh placed individual works around the Yellow House's guest room in Arles.
